I presented this talk at the 2023 LRES Student Research Symposium in Bozeman, MT, where I received **1st place** in the oral presentation competition. The presentation focused on how organic volatile compounds mediate interactions between wheat stem sawfly, its braconid parasitoids, and smooth brome.
